description: Stylesheet defining the theme and layout for a to-do list application.

classes.name: todo-app-container
classes.description: Container for the entire to-do application layout with styling for margins, background, shadows, and border.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Header section of the to-do application with centered text and background styling.

classes.name: todo-title
classes.description: Styling for the title of the to-do list, including font size and color.

classes.name: todo-input-bar
classes.description: Input bar for entering new to-do items, styled with flexbox layout.

classes.name: todo-list
classes.description: Styling for the todo list container, resetting default list styles.

classes.name: todo-item
classes.description: Styling for individual todo items with visual indicators for completed tasks.

classes.name: footer-root
classes.description: Styling for the footer area of the application.
